attributes.action: cut the prices of passports and the price must not go above £30 and you do not have to pay full price when you renew it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prices should be cut on passports so everyone can afford one and that the price does not exceed £30 for an adult passport & that you do not have to pay full price when renewing a passport for e.g. an adult should not be expected to pay more than £15 for a renewal

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
